column1: Art Institute of Chicago////If you enjoy Arts + Culture you'll probably need two days to truly enjoy the museum. However
column2: one full day (from open to close) will leave you artfully satisfied. If you get hungry the Museum café on the lower level is quite lovely. I wanted to dine at Terzo Piano but it was closed for a private event. That's how I ended up having a late lunch at the café by the fountain.
